body.title: TSA
body.heading: Check current TSA wait times
body.text: Don't forget your boarding pass or security documents, and a valid government-issued ID - the Transportation Security Administration (TSA) will need them at the security checkpoints.

body.title: AIRPORT DETAILS
body.text:
Service Animal Relief Area: There are two areas outside the Main Terminal located outside of Baggage Claim on both the north and south ends. The north area is outside of door #26, just past Carousel 16. It is a small sandy area to the left under the stairs. On the south end of Baggage Claim (outside door #00), there is a large grassy area at the end of the parking lot that is also equipped with bags for cleanup. Inside Area: There is s pet relief area in the Main Terminal, behind security, for assistance dogs who are traveling with their owners. It is next to the exit from Concourse B.

Learn more about Seattle-Tacoma International Airport
